document.heading: Nonprofit Raffle Licensing Amendment Temporary Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-83, the “Nonprofit Raffle Licensing Amendment Temporary Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-356. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 10, 1987 and November 24, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 10, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-118 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
